description: This Java class 'AuditAware' serves as a base entity class for auditing purposes in JPA entities. It includes fields for creation and modification timestamps and user identifiers, along with versioning support. The class is annotated to integrate with Spring Data JPA auditing features and uses Lombok for getters and setters.

classes.name: AuditAware
classes.description: An audit superclass for JPA entities, capturing creation and modification timestamps, users, and version control. It is designed to be extended by other entity classes requiring auditing features.

methods.name: getCreatedDate
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the entity was created.

methods.name: getCreatedBy
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the user who created the entity.

methods.name: getModifiedDate
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the entity was last modified.

methods.name: getModifiedBy
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the user who last modified the entity.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Returns the current version number of the entity.
